-- Create the Calendar table using CTAS
CREATE TABLE Calendar
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
AS
SELECT
    [Date],
    YEAR([Date]) AS [Year],
    MONTH([Date]) AS [Month],
    DAY([Date]) AS [Day],
    DATEPART(QUARTER, [Date]) AS [Quarter],
    DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) AS [DayOfWeek],
    CASE WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) IN (1, 7) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS [Weekday],
    DATEPART(WEEK, [Date]) AS [WeekOfYear],
    DATENAME(MONTH, [Date]) AS [MonthName],
    DATENAME(WEEKDAY, [Date]) AS [DayName],
    0 AS [IsHoliday] -- Set IsHoliday value based on your specific requirements
FROM
    (SELECT CAST('2000-01-01' AS DATE) AS [Date] UNION ALL SELECT DATEADD(DAY, 1, [Date]) FROM dbo.Calendar WHERE [Date] < '2030-12-31') AS c
OPTION (LABEL = 'Create Calendar', SINGLE_BLOB);
